It is not clear whether anyone was injured as a result of the incident. The local authorities have not commented on the situation yet.

item.media:title: Russian freight train derails after explosive device detonates on rail tracks in Bryansk region, Russia
item.media:description:
A freight train in the western region of Bryansk in Russia derailed on Monday, the 1st of May, 2023 after an "explosive device" detonated on the rail tracks, according to local governor Alexander Bogomaz. The incident occurred just one day after a Ukrainian strike killed four people in a Russian village in the Bryansk region, and as Kyiv prepared for a widely expected counter-offensive.
Bogomaz confirmed that there were no casualties, but the device went off "on the 136th kilometer" of the railroad between regional hub Bryansk and the town of Unecha, towards the border with Ukraine. Russian Railways stated that the front locomotive and seven wagons derailed "after the intervention of unauthorized persons." The company also said that the fire had been put out by 12.30 pm local time and that passengers of two Moscow-bound trains in the area would be taken by bus to the regional capital Bryansk.
Footage on social media showed the front of the train and several cargo carriages on fire and lying on the grass next to the tracks. There have been reports of sabotage acts on railroads in Russia and its ally Belarus throughout Moscow's more than year-long Ukraine offensive.

item.media:title: Russian shoplifter gets kicked out by store clerk: caught on camera
item.media:description:
A video surfaced on March 26th, 2023, of an unusual incident that occurred in Naberezhnye Chelny, Russia. A man attempted to steal a bottle of alcohol from a liquor store, but his actions quickly caught up with him. The store clerk noticed the theft and approached the man, kicking him in the backside before he could make his escape.
The entire incident was caught on a surveillance camera, and the video quickly went viral on social media.
item.media:keywords: Russia,Shoplifter,Liquor Store,Caught on Camera,Surveillance,Video,Viral,Social Media,Theft,Consequences,Naberezhnye Chelni,Incident,Kicked Out,Alcohol,Clerk,Controversy,Swift Kick,Attempted Theft,Consequences,Actions

item.media:title: Powerful earthquake strikes Kamchatka, Russia: home security camera captures chaos
item.media:description:
On April 3rd, 2023, a powerful earthquake with a magnitude of 6.9 struck Kamchatka, Russia, causing widespread chaos and panic throughout the region. The earthquake was felt most strongly in the city of Petropavlovsk-Kamchatsky, where people have been sharing photos and videos on social media in the aftermath of the quake.
One such video was captured by a home security camera in a private residence, which shows the violent shaking and destruction caused by the earthquake. Furniture can be seen swaying and falling, while objects are sent flying across the room. A poor cat can be seen frantically trying to navigate its way through the chaos.

item.media:title: Scooter crash at Bali restaraunt: guy escapes with minor injuries
item.media:description:
A guy on a scooter lost control and crashed into a local café in Bali, Indonesia on February 16, 2017. The incident left behind a trail of destruction as the scooter smashed into tables and chairs, causing a commotion in the area. Fortunately, no one was hurt, as the calmly sitting visitors managed to avoid the out-of-control scooter. The rider was lucky to escape with only minor injuries.
Eyewitnesses stated that the incident happened suddenly and that the rider had no control over the scooter. The café staff and visitors were quick to react and helped the rider, who was dazed after the accident

item.media:title: Massive Dome Collapse in Ufa, Russia Due to Strong Winds During Construction
item.media:description:
On March 13, 2023, strong winds caused the dome of a mosque under construction in Ufa, Russia, to fall, damaging the scaffolding. The main department of the Ministry of Emergency Situations for the Republic of Bashkortostan confirmed the incident, reporting that the building's integrity was not violated, and there were no casualties.
The cause of the incident is still under investigation, and it is not clear what specific factors contributed to the dome's collapse. However, it is known that the mosque in Ufa has been under construction for over a decade, and the height of the structure is supposed to reach 77 meters upon completion.

item.media:title: A young woman saves a 7-year-old boy who has fallen through ice in Russia
item.media:description:
On February 16, 2023, a young woman named Leyla Abdulazimova became a hero in Perm Krai, Russia. The 28-year-old realtor was on her way to pick up her car when she saw something lying on the snow-covered ice of a river. At first, she didn't realize it was a child, but then she heard his cries and knew she had to act fast.
The child in question was a 7-year-old boy who had fallen through the ice while walking home from school with a classmate and her mother. The children had been playing and running ahead, and at some point, the situation got out of control. The girl's mother, who was pregnant, saw what was happening but was unable to rush onto the ice herself because of her condition. Instead, she stopped passing cars in a panic, hoping someone would be able to help.
Luckily, Leyla was in one of those passing cars. When she saw the boy in the river, she asked her driver to stop and got out of the car. A man ran up to her, and she asked him how much he weighed, knowing that the ice was fragile and could break at any moment. Then she suggested that he hold her legs while she crawled out onto the ice. The plan worked, and Leyla was able to reach the boy and pull him to safety.
The boy was quite wet, up to his shoulders, but Leyla and the others who helped him were able to get him into a car and take him home. His father was waiting for him there, and they were able to warm him up quickly with hot tea and a change of clothes. The boy didn't even get sick, much to the relief of his worried mother.

item.media:title: An animal trainer was attacked by a lion during a circus performance in Russia
item.media:description:
African lions, the stars of a New Year's program called "Star Cruise" at the Sochi circus in Russia, turned violent during a performance on January 4, 2023. The incident was captured on video and has since been circulating online. The couple, Alexei Makarenko and Olga Borisova, were taming the lions when the animals refused to obey and began to destroy the props.
At one point during the performance, one of the predators approached Alexei from behind, jumped up, and bit him. The trainer fell from the attack, and Olga quickly ran to help him. She drove the animal away and helped the victim get up.
After the incident, the lions were quickly herded into an enclosure. Alexei was rushed to a medical facility, where he received treatment for the numerous bite and claw marks left on his back by the predator.
It is believed that two young lions were on stage during the performance and got into a conflict. When the tamers tried to calm the animals down, one of them attacked the man. The reason for the attack is still unknown, but it has been speculated that it was due to stress caused by the performance or a territorial dispute between the animals.

item.media:title: A drunk driver crashed into a convenience store in Russia.
item.media:description: On the 15th day of January, the city police began investigating the collision that occurred in Ryazan when a Chevrolet Lacetti lost control and crashed into a convenience store. According to sources, the car was driven by a 36-year-old citizen who was positively drunk. and the man who was in the store at the time of the accident was injured and sought medical attention. The shop has suffered serious damage. The car crashed through the trading floor, overturning merchandise racks and shattering shop windows.

item.media:title: The explosion and collapse occurred as a result of a fire in the shopping center "Mega Khimki"
item.media:description:
The explosion and collapse occurred in the Obi hypermarket in the Mega Khimki shopping center in the Moscow region.
The fire was reported to rescuers on the morning of Friday, December 9. At 07:05, the fire was assigned the fourth number of difficulty out of five.
According to the Ministry of Emergency Situations, the fire area was 7,000 square meters.
Video with explosions in the shopping center - in emergency services they explain with cans of paint and aerosols. The Ministry of Emergency Situations told about one deceased - a security guard of a hypermarket.
The cause of the fire is said to be welding work in the annex of the OBI hypermarket, which was carried out in violation of safety rules.

item.media:title: Skiers miraculously escaped after an avalanche in Sheregesh
item.media:description:
Two skiers were covered by a snow avalanche at the Sheregesh resort in the Kemerovo region. One man fell asleep so much that he simply could not get out of the "white captivity" on his own. Fortunately, a friend came to his aid in time.
The footage shows how extreme people ride on the mountain slopes and soon one of them is covered with an avalanche. The man remains under the rubble until his comrade saves him: raking the snow with his hands, he pulled out his friend in trouble in a matter of seconds. Well, when everything ended safely, the man began to thank the savior.
Skier Sergei Filippov said that at the time of the incident he really experienced a strong panic.
The man said that before the incident, he met local guys on the descent, who are very good at skiing. They took a ride together, and then one of Filippov's new acquaintances suggested that he go to another place where no one had been before. Moreover, the skier initially noticed that on this descent "small avalanches were cut."
“Well, that’s how it happened. Yes, the panic is very strong. And a very strong push, that is, it has so much strength, this avalanche. It was really scary,” Sergey said.
Credit to: Filippov Sergey

item.media:title: The girl fell into the ditch upside down!
item.media:description:
The incident was recorded by the CCTV of a resident's house, which showed the street area. A woman wearing a blue shirt, riding her automatic motorcycle, stops slowly at a red light. Suddenly, the woman fell to the side without being touched or hit by another vehicle. Sadly, the woman fell upside down into a ditch on the side of the road. The woman is fine.
Credit to: @johansuhandri

item.media:title: The woman spent more than a day in a trap between the wall and the closet.
item.media:description:
Rescuers helped a resident of Troitsk get out from under the rubble in her own house. The woman was crushed by a closet, and in this position she spent more than a day. The alarm was sounded by her colleagues when she did not come to work.
Worried colleagues went to her house and saw a shocking picture there: the house of a neat and disciplined woman was literally crammed with a pile of various rubbish. It turned out to be so much that they could not find the mistress among the large dump and called rescuers.
As a result, specialists evacuated the victim, she showed signs of severe hypothermia and prolonged circulatory disorders in the limbs. The woman was taken to the hospital. Now the patient is under the supervision of doctors in the hospital.
Credit to: Search and Rescue Service of the Chelyabinsk Region

item.media:title: The girl saved the schoolboy, who nearly fell under the wheels of the bus
item.media:description:
It all happened on the morning of December 8 at a pedestrian crossing near the house number 36 on Avanesov Street. A townswoman was crossing the road and, approaching the sidewalk, a schoolboy ran out to meet her at the pedestrian crossing. The girl grabbed the child and thereby saved him from the bus, which rushed along the second lane.
The girl's name is Yana. The girl told what she experienced at the moment when she saved the life of this boy.
“I was late for school. At the time when I was crossing the road, the bus was moving slowly, but when I walked a little further, I saw that it was picking up speed. Then I saw a boy who ran from the square. There was a car, because of which it was not visible. I was afraid that the bus driver might simply not see him, because the boy was short, he looked about seven or eight years old. When he ran past me, I grabbed him. I was very scared for him, I didn’t say anything to the boy, I was just shocked by this incident, ”she said.
A few days after the incident, the traffic police awarded the girl for her act.

item.media:title: Semeru volcano erupts on East Java, Indonesia caught by CCTV
item.media:description: Highest volcano, Mount Semeru, spewed a column of volcanic ash into the air in a dramatic eruption on Sunday, December 4. Indonesia raises an alert, prompting evacuations of nearby residents.

item.media:title: A man beat a woman because of a parking space in the center of Tula
item.media:description:
In the video, a person, most likely waiting for someone, stands on the roadway and does not allow anyone to park. One woman still managed to put the car in a free place. The man did not like it, and he decided to figure it out - he went up to the motorist and tore off her hat. She responded with a blow, and the attacker was also left without a headdress.
The girl tried to defend herself from the blows of an adult large man, but he hit her head on the roof of the car. And all this happened in front of the child who was sitting in the car.
A passer-by intervened and dragged the man aside. Now the victim is in the hospital in the neurosurgical department. Immediately after the attack, the woman called the police, from which her offender tried to escape. The assailant is believed to have held a seat for the bailiff. He himself witnessed the massacre of his assistant over the woman after he parked the car in another place.
An administrative case has been initiated on this fact of beatings.

item.media:title: Bike running on road without rider
item.media:description:
There was an accident at that time, then the motorbike was out of control and ran by itself, it stopped when it hit a wall. The victim suffered broken bones and abrasions.
Credit to: @chalismahardika

item.media:title: The guard doesn't let the student's mother into the school!
item.media:description: 14 October 2022, Michurinsk, Russia The guard was ordered not to let inside the school, due to terrorist acts. But woman still tries to break through, fights with the guard and swears!

item.media:title: Fire and explosions in Moscow in the Mega shopping center
item.media:description: The explosion and collapse occurred in the Obi hypermarket in the Mega Khimki shopping center in the Moscow region. The fire was reported to rescuers on the morning of Friday, December 9. At 07:05, the fire was assigned the fourth number of difficulty out of five. According to the Ministry of Emergency Situations, the fire area was 7,000 square meters. Video with explosions in the shopping center - in emergency services they explain with cans of paint and aerosols. The Ministry of Emergency Situations told about one deceased - a security guard of a hypermarket. The cause of the fire is said to be welding work in the annex of the OBI hypermarket, which was carried out in violation of safety rules.

item.media:title: The train fell off the jack during repairs in Tokyo!
item.media:description: 17 November 2022, Tokyo, Japan At the railway crossing in Tokyo the train derailed near Kisei-takasago station, Katsusika-ku. Workers diligently lifted it back onto the rails, but the train fell off the jack. Luckily no one was hurt! Eventually the train was successfully put back on the line! Credit to: @beikoku_tanmouand

item.media:title: Pensioner tried to beat her neighbor with a piece of plinth because of the noise in the entrance
item.media:description:
An elderly woman from St. Petersburg attacked a neighbor with a piece of plinth because of the noise in the entrance. The incident took place in Kupchino.
The pensioner waited for the girl near the entrance of a residential building on Malaya Balkanskaya and tried to hit her with a long object. She accompanied her actions with cries of “you can’t hammer.”
The victim recognized the brawler as a neighbor from below. She explained that her apartment has been empty for months and no one can make noise there.

item.media:title: A fight between a buyer and sellers in a Russian store in Samara
item.media:description:
The fight took place in a store on Dachnaya Street. Customers claim the man tried to steal food from the store, but was caught. 4 people had a hard time dealing with a potential thief.
People's opinions about the actions of store employees are divided: in social networks, some residents write that some people are already "tired of stealing in supermarkets." Others believe that the sellers had no right to do so.
The police are investigating the circumstances of the incident.
